title: Stranger Things
description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

title: The Crown
description: This drama follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started.

title: Wednesday
description: Smart, sarcastic and a little dead inside, Wednesday Addams investigates a murder spree while navigating her years as a student at Nevermore Academy.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads an elite squad.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.

title: House of the Dragon
description: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

title: The Batman
description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption.

title: Dahmer - Monster
description: The Jeffrey Dahmer story told from the perspective of the victims and police incompetence that allowed the Wisconsin native to go on a killing spree.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.

title: Ozark
description: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug boss.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man's identity is revealed, he asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear.

title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' has a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history at the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.
